philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Crafted for the Modern Sanctuary
philosophy.p1: We believe that scent is more than just a fragrance—it's an atmosphere, a memory, a feeling. Every Kefi creation is meticulously hand-poured using sustainable soy wax and premium phthalate-free oils, designed to elevate your space with intention and grace.
philosophy.p2: From the flicker of the wick to the lingering scent, we invite you to pause, breathe, and find beauty in the stillness.

illumination.label: Our Process
illumination.title: The Art of Illumination
illumination.description: Our process is slow, intentional, and sustainable. We use only 100% natural soy wax and lead-free wicks, hand-poured in small batches in our New York studio.
illumination.clean_burning_desc: No paraffins, phthalates, or synthetic dyes.
illumination.quote: "Light is not just a utility, it's an atmosphere."

origins.label: Our Origins
origins.p1: Kefi Studio was founded in 2023 in the heart of New York City, born from a simple belief: that the right scent can transform a space and elevate everyday moments into something extraordinary.
origins.p2: What started as a passion project in a small Brooklyn apartment has grown into a curated collection of artisanal candles, each hand-poured with intention and care.
origins.quote: We believe in the power of slow living, of taking the time to appreciate the small rituals that bring us joy.

questions.question: How long do your candles burn?
questions.answer: Our candles are designed for longevity. An 8oz candle burns for approximately 50-60 hours, while our 12oz candles provide 70-80 hours of burn time when properly cared for.

questions.question: What are your candles made of?
questions.answer: We use 100% natural soy wax, lead-free cotton wicks, and premium phthalate-free fragrance oils. All our ingredients are sustainably sourced and cruelty-free.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Currently, we ship within the United States and Canada. We're working on expanding our shipping options to serve customers worldwide. Sign up for our newsletter to be notified when international shipping becomes available.

questions.question: How do I care for my candle?
questions.answer: For the best experience, trim the wick to 1/4 inch before each burn, allow the wax to melt evenly across the surface on the first burn, and avoid burning for more than 4 hours at a time. Keep away from drafts and never leave unattended.

questions.question: Do you offer custom orders?
questions.answer: Yes! We love creating custom candles for special events, weddings, and corporate gifts. Contact us at hello@kefistudio.com with your requirements, and we'll work with you to create something unique.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We want you to love your candles. If you're not completely satisfied, contact us within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange. The candle must be unused and in its original packaging.
